meta.p:
Hello and welcome back to “Ugyen Wangdi Artworks” blog page. It has been a very long time since my last contact with the readers and friends with updates of my artworks in blog. My blog site which was under repair is now complete with improved version and I am pleased to be back online to keep constant touch with all the aspiring clients, readers, friends and the public.
Everyone will now see more of my artworks as I will be sharing the same through regular post updates in my blog. I hope all the aspiring clients and visitors will remain inspired by my artworks and rejoice with benefits of peace and happiness.
The archive of landscapes, portraits and other oil paintings on canvas and which are true testimonials of all my artworks till now can be viewed under the submenu page of 'Portfolio' of this blog. All interested may kindly follow my blogsite by clicking on the 'Follow' at the right column of the blog
Thanks for visiting my blog site and welcome all to visit again.
